articles.title: Parag Agrawal is out, but another Indian-origin executive is helping Elon Musk run Twitter - India Today
articles.description: Parag Agrawal and some of the top Twitter executives are out, but there’s one Indian-origin executive helping Elon Musk restructure the company. Sriram Krishnan publicly announced working with Musk.
